With Planned Parenthood the biggest recipient of those funds, Mike Pence said Americans should be "shocked" that the organization "has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking." The recent release of an undercover video exposing duplicity and potential criminality by an employee of Planned Parenthood is an outrage, Mike Pence said. Good for America "I can appreciate the fact that Mike Pence 's unyielding right-wing voting record on literally every issue is appreciated by the far-right," The Washington Monthly's liberal Steve Benen says. But to say that the guy isn't ready for prime time is a dramatic understatement. Mike Pence has no areas of expertise, has no major pieces of legislation to his name, has demonstrated no working understanding of any area of public policy, and after spending five minutes watching him speak on any subject, it becomes clear that he's conspicuously unintelligent.
